name: Ragtastic
description:
BETA/CONCEPT

This game is made for mobile, For the best experience please consider downloading the app.

If you are playing the browser version & cant see the full screen go in to fullscreen mode on the browser you are using.

Ragtastic is a game where you slide a ragdoll through levels collecting coins to buy items & players. Try to get all 10 coins in each level.

PC Controls: a: move left d: move right space: use jetpack (Lerpz only)

Android Controls: Touch the screen on the side you want to move on Tap the buttons XD Accelerometer controls will be added
